content.text: Each workspace has a built-in group chat. Messages are encrypted, synced peer-to-peer, and stored locally. All workspace members can participate.

content.caption: The encrypted workspace chat with @mentions and desktop notifications.

items: Click the chat icon or panel to expand the chat area.
Type your message and press Enter to send.
